entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
